// 3DMigoto StereoParams:

// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 1c6b4d3f3ecd5a1b-ps.txt

mul r5.w, r5.x, r5.y
mul r7.x, r5.w, cb0[9].x
mul r7.y, r5.w, cb0[10].x
mul r7.z, r5.w, cb0[11].x
mul r7.w, r5.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r8.x, r7.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r8.y, r7.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r8.z, r7.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r6.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r8.xyz

div r0.x, l(0.0166666675), cb1[41].y
mul r0.x, r0.x, cb1[41].z
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.yz, v2.xyxx, t2.zxyw, s2
ne r1.xy, r0.yzyy, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
and r0.w, r1.y, r1.x
if_nz r0.w
  lt r0.w, l(1.000000), r0.y
  add r1.x, r0.y, l(-2.000000)
  movc r0.y, r0.w, r1.x, r0.y
  add r0.yz, r0.yyzy, r0.yyzy
else 
  sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, v2.xyxx, t0.xyzw, s0
  mov r1.yw, l(0,1.000000,0,1.000000)
  dp2 r1.z, r1.xyxx, cb0[11].zwzz
  dp2 r1.x, r1.xyxx, cb0[12].zwzz
  div r1.x, -r1.z, r1.x
  div r1.x, -r1.x, v0.z
  mul r1.xyz, r1.xxxx, v0.xyzx
  dp4 r2.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[0].xyzw
  dp4 r2.y, r1.xyzw, cb1[1].xyzw
  dp4 r2.z, r1.xyzw, cb1[2].xyzw
  mov r2.w, l(1.000000)
  dp4 r1.x, r2.xyzw, cb1[10].xyzw
  dp4 r1.y, r2.xyzw, cb1[11].xyzw
  dp4 r1.z, r2.xyzw, cb1[12].xyzw
  mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
  dp4 r2.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[6].xyzw
  dp4 r2.y, r1.xyzw, cb1[7].xyzw
  dp4 r1.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[9].xyzw
  max r1.x, r1.x, l(0.000100)
  div r1.xy, r2.xyxx, r1.xxxx
  max r1.z, |r1.y|, |r1.x|
  mul r1.z, r1.z, l(0.500000)
  max r1.z, r1.z, l(1.000000)
  div r1.xy, r1.xyxx, r1.zzzz
  div r1.zw, v1.xxxy, v1.zzzz
  add r0.yw, -r1.xxxy, r1.zzzw
  mov r0.z, -r0.w
endif 
mul r1.xy, r0.xxxx, r0.yzyy
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, v2.xyxx, t1.xyzw, s1
mad r3.xyzw, r1.xyxy, l(-4.000000, -4.000000, -3.000000, -3.000000), v2.xyxy
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r3.xyxx, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r0.w, r2.w, r4.w
and r1.z, r0.w, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r4.xyzx, r1.zzzz, r2.xyzx
movc r0.w, r0.w, l(2.000000), l(1.000000)
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, r3.zwzz, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r1.z, r2.w, r3.w
and r1.z, r1.z, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r3.xyzx, r1.zzzz, r2.xyzx
add r0.w, r0.w, r1.z
mad r3.xyzw, r1.xyxy, l(-2.000000, -2.000000, 3.000000, 3.000000), v2.xyxy
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r3.xyxx, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r1.z, r2.w, r4.w
and r1.z, r1.z, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r4.xyzx, r1.zzzz, r2.xyzx
add r0.w, r0.w, r1.z
mad r1.zw, -r0.yyyz, r0.xxxx, v2.xxxy
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r1.zwzz, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r1.z, r2.w, r4.w
and r1.z, r1.z, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r4.xyzx, r1.zzzz, r2.xyzx
add r0.w, r0.w, r1.z
mad r0.xy, r0.yzyy, r0.xxxx, v2.xyxx
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r0.xyxx, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r0.x, r2.w, r4.w
and r0.x, r0.x, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r4.xyzx, r0.xxxx, r2.xyzx
add r0.x, r0.x, r0.w
mad r0.yz, r1.xxyx, l(0.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), v2.xxyx
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r4.xyzw, r0.yzyy, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r0.y, r2.w, r4.w
and r0.y, r0.y, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r4.xyzx, r0.yyyy, r2.xyzx
add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, r3.zwzz, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r0.y, r2.w, r3.w
and r0.y, r0.y, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r3.xyzx, r0.yyyy, r2.xyzx
add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
mad r0.yz, r1.xxyx, l(0.000000, 4.000000, 4.000000, 0.000000), v2.xxyx
sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, r0.yzyy, t1.xyzw, s1
eq r0.y, r2.w, r3.w
and r0.y, r0.y, l(0x3f800000)
mad r2.xyz, r3.xyzx, r0.yyyy, r2.xyzx
add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
div o0.xyz, r2.xyzx, r0.xxxx
dp2 r0.x, r1.xyxx, r1.xyxx
sqrt r0.x, r0.x
mul r0.x, r0.x, l(1000.000000)
min o0.w, r0.x, l(1.000000)
ret 
// Approximately 93 instruction slots used
